attributes.review: The first time I opened the app I was so excited to see everything about our wonderful president! But slowly I noticed my pets would disappear every time I opened the app! I was outraged! 😾I used to have 100 lions, 99, zebras 🦓 , 98 horses 🐎 , 97 chinchillas, 96 snakes 🐍 , 95 tigers 🐅, 94 rats 🐀, 93 kangaroos 🦘, 92 spiders 🕷, 91 leopards 🐆, 90 cheetahs, 89 chameleons, 88 dingos, 87 hippos 🦛, 86 foxes 🦊, 85 dogs 🐕, 84 cats 🐈, 83 fish 🐠, 82 skunks 🦨, 81 lizards 🦎, 80 hedgehogs 🦔, 71 cows 🐄, 70 pigs 🐖, 69 goats 🐐, 68 chickens 🐓, 67 ducks 🦆, 66 birds 🦢, 65 bears 🐻, 64 turkeys 🦃, 63 sheep 🐑, 62 rams 🐏, 61 rabbits 🐇, 60 sloths 🦥, 59 peacocks 🦚, 58 dragons 🐉, 57 camels 🐫, 56 elephants 🐘, 55 squirrels 🐿, 54 sharks 🦈, 53 dolphins 🐬, 52 gorillas 🦍, 51 orangutans 🦧, 50 deer 🦌, 49 turtles 🐢, 48 alligators 🐊, 47 whales 🐋, 46 octopi 🐙, 45 squid 🦑, 44 ants 🐜, 43 bees 🐝, 42 slugs 🐌, 41 warthogs, 40 wolfs 🐺, 39 eagles 🦅, 38 monkeys 🐒, 37 ladybugs 🐞, 36 scorpions 🦂, 35 crabs 🦀, 34 lobsters 🦞, 33 owls 🦉, 32 dinosaurs 🦖, 31 giraffes 🦒, 30 llamas 🦙, 29 mice 🐁, 28 raccoons 🦝, 27 rhinos 🦏, 26 puffer fish, 25 otters, 24 flamingos 🦩, 23 bats 🦇, 22 koalas 🐨, 21 pandas 🐼, 20 shrimps 🦐, 19 penguins 🐧, 18 frogs 🐸, 17 mosquitos 🦟, 16 grasshoppers, 15 mountain lion, 14 dodos, 13 black panthers, 12 snow leopards, 11 beetles, 10 lemurs, 9 polar bears, 8 weasels, 7 seahorses, 6 orcas, 5 buffalo, 4 beavers, 3 crocodiles, 2 blue-faced boobies, and one unicorn 🦄! But now I only have my last chinchilla that I named ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ. FIX THIS GLITCH MY HOME ZOO IS MISSING!!! WOOD GIV ZERO ⭐️S IF POSIBLE!!
attributes.title: The app ate my chinchilla !! 😡😡
